title: Amircano
description: Caffè Americano is a type of coffee drink prepared by diluting an espresso with hot water

title: latte
description: latte is a coffee beverage of Italian origin made with espresso and steamed milk.

title: white mocha
description: Our signature espresso meets white chocolate sauce and steamed milk.

title: V60
description: V60 is one of specialty coffee’s favourite brewing methods.

title: flat white
description: coffee drink consisting of espresso with microfoam (steamed milk with small, fine bubbles and a glossy or velvety consistency).

title: espresso
description: is a coffee-brewing method of Italian origin.

title: cortado
description: cortado is a beverage consisting of espresso mixed with a roughly equal amount of warm milk to reduce the acidity.
